# Piston Fist

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Kekkei Genkai~J큰go's Clan's Kekkei Genkai, Ninjutsu, Taijutsu, Senjutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short
- Users: J큰go
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game

## Summary
While using his Sage Transformation ability, J큰go can alter his arm into a piston to increase his attack power. To increase it even more, J큰go can form jets on his hands or elbows.
